Lets animate!

The animate section from Sections Pro has no UI, rather it allows you to add entrance animations to most existing Sections Pro sections. How does it work? Simple. Just add the section just like any other section and place it above an existing Sections Pro section. Select your animation options and it will auto-magically work. It works with all sections except our modals or sections that are fixed on the screen (action button, page tag, section nave).

You can choose the type of animation including popular fading and sliding animations. You can also choose which part of the section to animate. Each section has defined animations zones including the section itself, the container inside the section, and columns (if applicable).

Scroll down to see some examples below.

Slide In Animation

This is the Columns Premium section animated using the Animate section from Sections Pro. You can choose from fade in and slide animations. You can slide from the bottom up or from off the page onto the page. It is an easy way to add attention grabbing animations to your page.

Slide Column

This is the Columns Premium section animated using the Animate section from Sections Pro. You can choose from fade in and slide animations. You can slide from the bottom up or from off the page onto the page. It is an easy way to add attention grabbing animations to your page.

Fade In Animation

This is the Columns Premium section animated using the Animate section from Sections Pro. You can choose from fade in and slide animations. You can slide from the bottom up or from off the page onto the page. It is an easy way to add attention grabbing animations to your page.
